Crl.M.C No.347 of 2014
Dated this the 5" day of January, 2015
ORDER
The prayer in this proceeding is to quash FIR.
The learned Public Prosecutor submits that the crime itself
stands now referred. It appears that the petitioner accepts
the same. Hence the submission made by the learned Public
Prosecutor is recorded, and the Criminal Miscellaneous Case
is closed.
P.UBAID
JUDGE
